title: Amazon boosts holiday hiring, signaling shift in retail jobs
text:
Published By: Boston Herald Business - Today 
NEW YORK â€” Amazon plans to hire 100,000 people for the holidays, a 25 percent jump from last year that reveals a shift in the way we shop....
